sentences.sContent: Academic staff are appointed on the recommendation of a committee.
sentences.sCn: 教员是委员会推荐任命的。

sentences.sContent: We will review the case and make a recommendation to the client.
sentences.sCn: 我们将审查此案，然后向当事人提出建议。

sentences.sContent: ...200 letters of recommendation for post-doctor at positions in geoscience...
...the letters of recommendation from all over the world...

words.tran: 推荐，介绍；劝告；使受欢迎；托付

trans.tranOther: a suggestion to someone that they should choose a particular thing or person that you think is very good
